title: Death anniversary of sarinda player Munir Sarhadi today
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 23 (APP):The 44th death anniversary of renowned sarinda player and folk singer, Munir Sarhadi, is being observed today.
Munir Sarhadi was conferred the Pride of Performance award in 1978 by the Government of Pakistan in recognition of his services to the field of music.
He passed away on this day in 1980 in Peshawar.
